description: Minor Material Amendment S.73 application to vary condition 2, removal of wording '1560 no more than Â½ neighbouring courtyard' from approved plans pursuant to planning permission 216005HH dated 30.11.2021 for  'Single storey, part two storey, rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope; installation of a green sedum roof to first floor flat roofs'
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of the original permission (216005HH).

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: A-P-001 Rev C Block Plan; A-P-002 Rev C Location Plan; A-P-100 Rev C Existing Ground Floor Plan; A-P-101 Rev D Existing First Floor Plan; A-P-102 Rev D Existing Roof Plan; A-P-110 Rev C Proposed Ground Floor Plan; A-P-111 Rev D Proposed First Floor Plan; A-P-112 Rev F Proposed Second Floor Plan; A-P-113 Rev F Proposed Roof Plan; A-P-201 Rev D Proposed Demolition First Floor Plan; A-P-202 Rev D Proposed Demolition Roof Plan; A-S-300 Rev B Existing Section A-A; A-S-301 Rev B Existing Section B-B; A-S-310 Rev C Proposed Section A-A; A-S-311 Rev B Proposed Section B-B; A-E-400 Rev C Existing North-West Elevation; A-E-401 Rev C Existing South-East Elevation; A-E-410 Rev C Proposed North-West Elevation; A-E-411 Rev D Proposed South-East Elevation; Design and Access Statement prepared by Harriott-Eyles Ltd dated October 2021; 21031-16AR-P-AR-001_01 Design and Access Statement prepared by Harriott-Eyles dated 30 March 2022; Daylight, Sunlight & Overshadowing Assessment prepared by Blackacre Chartered Building Surveyors dated 29 November 2021.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012). | No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
